name: Reflect Run
description:
NOTE- PLEASE USE THE ALT LINK IN THE DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS, THE ORIGINAL FILE IS A .YYZ, BUT THE DRIVE LINK IS TO AN APPLICATION ANYONE CAN RUN

This was a weird jam, but great fun! My first ever (mostly) solo jam! The hosts asked for entry's to stick to one or more from these themes (I of course did all three, because why not?); Dragons, Radiation, and Reflections, all while using only 2 colours! as an additional challenge the organizers asked we use game maker, so for the first time ever I did exactly that! The hosts also asked for source code if we wanted, but with it being my first time using GML i decided against it. The hosts also asked for entries to use Retro Palette Swapper, but i couldn't afford it. I wish I could though, it would have been so handy for a project like this. 

There are 4 game modes, two for single player, Classic and Hardcore, and two for those of us not in isolation, Versus and Co-op. Rules are in the game, and lastly if you like this game please let me know and remember to vote for it in the jam!
